keywords.Cleave:
Deals damage to a unit's neighbors.

Cleave deals X damage to the cards directly to the left and right of the unit being attacked. Cleave does not trigger if there is no unit to cleave off, such as the tower being attacked instead.
keywords.Condemn:
Indiscriminately kills a target.

Condemning any card in play instantly destroys it. Condemning an enemy unit awards the appropriate amount of gold that you would have recieved through destroying it through combat or other means. You do not receive gold for condemning your own cards.
keywords.Damage Immunity:
Grants invulnerability to traditional damage.

Units with Damage Immunity cannot be dealt any damage from any source. They can still be killed through other means, such as HP loss.
keywords.Death Shield: Protect to a unit when it goes to die by damage.
keywords.Disarm:
Prevents a unit from attacking.

Disarming a card prevents it from attacking in the next Combat Phase.
keywords.Neighbors: Units directly to the left and right of the target unit.
keywords.Get Initiate: After you play a spell, you get the initiative coin and may immediately take another action. If you use the action to pass, you will retain initiative and may act first in the lane.
keywords.Lock: Locked cards in hand can't be played in X rounds.
keywords.Pulse: A delay between effects of a spell or ability. Continuous effects are updated, reactive abilities are processed, and units that have been condemned or dealt lethal damage are destroyed.
keywords.Rapid Deployment:
Reduces the time spent waiting to be redeployed in the Fountain.

Rapid Deployment allows dead Heroes such as Rix overview Rix to ignore the normal 2 turn wait to reenter play, causing them to be immediately deployable in the next Deployment Phase.
keywords.Regeneration:
Heals and prevents combat damage.

It is essentially negative combat damage. It applies during Combat Damage, potentially negating or even healing past damage. Regeneration can also save heroes from lethal damage.
keywords.Retaliate:
Deals damage to attacking cards.

A card with Retaliate X deals X damage to any unit attacking it.
keywords.Siege:
Damages the tower when blocked.

Siege Damage deals damage directly to the opponent's structure in the lane whenever the unit with Siege damage is blocked.
keywords.Silence:
Prevents ability activation and spell casting.

Silence prevents the afflicted hero from activating any abilities, which includes both hero abilities and item abilities. Additionally, a silenced hero cannot be used to fulfil the color requirement for casting spells (If you silence the only Green Cards. Green hero in a lane, your opponent cannot cast any Green Cards)
keywords.Stun:
Prevents damage, abilities and spell casting.

It is essentially a combination of Disarm and Silence, preventing heroes from attacking (and hence dealing damage in combat), using items or abilities and enabling spell-casting.
keywords.Swap:
Exchanges the position of two units.

Swap exchanges the position of two units immediately, resetting combat targets and recalculating pathing.
keywords.Taunt:
Redirects enemy attacks.

Taunt forces neighbors of a target unit to attack it. It does not affect any cards that cannot normally attack the unit.

cards.name: Loyal Beast
cards.text: When Loyal Beast deals battle damage to a unit, modify that unit with -1 Attack.

cards.name: Plague Ward
cards.text: Before the action phase, deal 2 piercing damage to a random enemy neighbor of Plague Ward.

skills.name: Borrowerd Time
skills.text: Fully heal Abaddon and give it Damage Immunity this round.

cards.name: Act of Defiance
cards.text: Modify allied creeps with +2 Attack and +1 Armor.

cards.name: Allseeing One's Favor
cards.text: Modify a green hero with "Allies have +2 Regeneration"
